description: Always a step ahead: the innovative features of the Ducan line combined with a BOA® Fit System. Anatomically shaped for optimal fit and comfort, this shoe is designed to slip on like a sock and provides quick and precise adjustments through the innovative BOA® Fit System. The spring-steel midsole improves shock absorption and supports the natural forward rolling of the foot, while lateral stability reduces arch pressure. The waterproof GORE-TEX membrane keeps your feet dry when the weather plays up and the secure Vibram sole provides outstanding grip with every step. Adventure awaits with the Ducan BOA® Low GTX.
name: Mammut Ducan Boa Low GTX - Mens

specs.value: delivers dialed in performance and a micro-adjustable, precision fit. Can be operated while wearing gloves
